Good Comments: The best. HD, no typos, great typesetting, Karaoke. Typical Menclave quality.

If you prefer clean/simple fansubs, try other groups. If you prefer clean/simple fansubs with clean/simple fonts and clean/simple karaoke and clean/simple typesetting that blends in seamlessly into a clean/simple HD encode, grab this one.
Great choice if you want quality fansubbing
Definitely the best out of Ocha!, Euthanasia, and TSHNN. I'm thoroughly glad they decided to pick this series up.
Good group x bad group = bad job.
Bad Comments: s-l-o-w. but then again this is Menclave, I should've expected it.
EXCELLENT! Beautiful typesetting, nice encoding - It's great!
The only group I'll watch for this anime. :]
Excelent subs. Satsuga Menclave desu ne.

Uses awful fonts for the karaoke, which shouldn't even be there (unless you're a nerd who sings along to it). Also has a lot unnecessary translations. Translating every text on the screen does not equate quality.
Simple fonts and good translation.Thumbs up.Best sub group for Toshokan Sensou imo.
Good quality subbing, reliable despite not releasing episodes as consistently as I would like them to >.>. It was good however when they released the last 3 eps together =)
